TextView.android:text:
Create New Project: 

* Make sure you have the latest version installed.
* Open Android Studio
* Select Start a new Android Studio project.
* On the Create New Project window that opens.
* Name your project.
* If you choose to, set the company name as desired.
* Set your directory if desired..
* Click Next.
* Select Phone and Tablet.
* Double check operating system level for your SDK.
* Click Next.
* Select Blank Activity.
* Click Next.
* Leave all of the Activity name fields as they are.
* Click Finish.
* Import existing project:
* Click File > New > Import Project.
* Navigate to the root directory of the project.
* Click OK.
 * Look through all the files created.
* Look at layout XML.
* Look at a MainActivity.java.
* Double check all the properties of all the components.
* Look for strings in the resources area.
* Start getting familiar with the tool bars.
* Start getting familiar with the menu system.
* Explore all the available components.
* Explore the java code organization.
* Visit the in app tutorials.
* Visit online tutorials.
* Start coding your project.
